meanings.definition: A dish of Mexican origin consisting of strips of marinated meat, grilled and served with tortillas and various toppings.
meanings.sent1: The sizzling fajita was a favorite at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a chicken fajita for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: The fajita told a cheesy joke to the taco.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter sizzled like a fajita on a hot grill.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the fajita lingered in the air, tempting everyone around.

meanings.definition: A tortilla filled with strips of marinated meat, grilled vegetables, and other toppings.
meanings.sent1: She savored every bite of the flavorful fajita.
meanings.sent2: The sizzling sound of the fajita filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The fajita danced on the plate, showing off its toppings.
meanings.sent4: His words were as spicy as a fajita on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fajita looked like a work of art on the plate.
